name: 廖天豪
objective:
本課程將介紹衛星遙測技術基礎，包括衛星通訊軟體及硬體，以及在地球科學、環境管理、農業和城市規劃中的應用。透過理論講授、案例研究和實習，學生將了解衛星遙測技術原理及其在各領域的實際應用。課程強調實際應用和解決問題的能力，並提供實習機會，讓學生參與衛星遙測專案，培養操作技能和解決問題的能力。
This course will cover the basics of satellite remote sensing technology, including satellite communication software and hardware, as well as its applications in Earth sciences, environmental management, agriculture, and urban planning. Through theoretical lectures, case studies, and practical exercises, students will gain an understanding of the principles of satellite remote sensing technology and its practical applications in various fields. The course emphasizes practical applications and problem-solving skills, providing labs for students to participate in satellite remote sensing projects and cultivate their operational skills and problem-solving abilities.
schedule:
第 1 週：課程介紹與衛星遙測基本概念
第 2 週：衛星遙測的歷史背景與基本原理
第 3 週：天線系統簡介（類型、頻段、追蹤原理）與應用介紹
第 4 週：衛星地面接收站架構與運作方式（含下行資料流程、時序控制）
第 5 週：地面站實習（一）：實地參訪與衛星追蹤演示（如有設備可操作）
第 6 週：地面站實習（二）：遙測數據接收模擬、基礎資料檔案結構說明
第 7 週：衛星遙測數據的獲取與存儲（開放資源介紹、資料下載練習）
第 8 週：衛星影像的預處理方法（幾何 / 輻射 / 大氣校正）
第 9 週：期中考
第 10 週：光學遙測與無人機影像技術介紹
第 11 週：衛星影像獲取與處理實驗（平台操作、簡易影像處理）
第 12 週：遙測影像基本解譯與視覺分析（NDVI、影像分類等）
第 13 週：遙測應用實驗（一）：氣象與氣候變化監測
第 14 週：遙測應用實驗（二）：農業監測與土地利用變化
第 15 週：遙測應用實驗（三）：災害監測與應變管理
第 16 週：學生彙整實習成果與準備個別報告
第 17 週：綜合案例討論與課程總結
第 18 週：期末報告發表與成果展示


Course Schedule

Week 1: Course Introduction and Fundamentals of Satellite Remote Sensing
Week 2: Historical Background and Principles of Remote Sensing
Week 3: Introduction to Antenna Systems (Types, Frequency Bands, Tracking Mechanisms)
Week 4: Satellite Ground Station Architecture and Data Reception Workflow
Week 5: Ground Station Practice I: Site Visit and Satellite Tracking Demonstration
Week 6: Ground Station Practice II: Simulated Data Reception and File Structure Overview
Week 7: Acquisition and Sources of Satellite Remote Sensing Data (Open Access Platforms)
Week 8: Preprocessing of Satellite Imagery (Geometric, Radiometric, Atmospheric Corrections)
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Optical Remote Sensing and UAV Imaging Technologies
Week 11: Practical: Acquiring and Processing Satellite Imagery
Week 12: Basic Interpretation and Analysis of Remote Sensing Data (e.g., NDVI, Classification)
Week 13: Application Lab I: Meteorology and Climate Monitoring
Week 14: Application Lab II: Agricultural Monitoring and Land Use Analysis
Week 15: Application Lab III: Disaster Detection and Emergency Management
Week 16: Student Project Preparation: Internship Report and Experience Reflection
Week 17: Case Study Discussions and Course Summary
Week 18: Final Project Presentations
